sentences.en: ...a legal shortcut to take homes from delinquent borrowers.
sentences.cn: …一个取得拖欠贷款者房产的法律捷径。

sentences.en: Deanes writes and lectures about teenage delinquents.
sentences.cn: 迪恩斯就不良青少年问题撰文并演讲。

sentences.en: He is delinquent in paying his rent.
It would define standards, police compliance and penalize delinquent firms.
sentences.cn: 该局将会设定标准, 让各个机构服从监管并且惩罚有过失的企业.

sentences.en: Juvenile delinquent hackers launch potent computer viruses.
sentences.cn: 少年黑客罪犯放出了威力巨大的计算机病毒.

sentences.en: Like the juvenile delinquent thought of having her boyfriend, everyday is bothering him.
sentences.cn: 暗恋亚纪的不良少年以为稔是她的男朋友, 天天找他麻烦.

sentences.en: Lots of studies, however, find a correlation between corporal punishment and aggressive, delinquent behaviour.
sentences.cn: 诸多研究反倒是指出体罚与攻击等不良行为之间存在联系.

sentences.en: More recent ideas include managing distressed power stations and buying delinquent credit - card debts from banks.
sentences.cn: 但目前来看,上述灾祸人们太过熟悉,算不上什么“奇异”.

sentences.en: Reinstatement requires payment of all delinquent and current charges.
sentences.cn: 若要恢复会籍需要偿付所有拖欠款项及目前的帐款.

sentences.en: Reports of clashes between workers and delinquent factory owners have increased in recent months.
sentences.cn: 近几个月来工人与违约工厂老板之间爆发冲突的报道已有增多.

sentences.en: The banks would have to let judges write down delinquent mortgages to levels homeowners could afford.
sentences.cn: 这个建议会使得经济大萧条时期的复兴银行公司重现江湖.

sentences.en: The businessman was billed for delinquent taxes.
sentences.cn: 那商人因拖欠税金而被罚款.

sentences.en: The finance department will juggle a few of the delinquent accounts.
sentences.cn: 财务部会篡改一些拖欠账户.

sentences.en: The juvenile delinquent was sent to the reformatory.
sentences.cn: 该少年违者被关进教养院改造.

words.tran_cn: 行为不良，违法犯罪；失职，怠工
有过失的；怠忽的；拖欠债务的
流氓；行为不良的人；失职者

trans.tran_cn: 不尽责的，怠工的，有过失的，拖欠债务的
trans.tran_en: A delinquent borrower or taxpayer is someone who has failed to pay their debts or taxes

trans.tran_cn: 少年罪犯；懈怠者；过失者；违犯者
trans.tran_en: someone, especially a young person, who breaks the law or behaves in ways their society does not approve of
